colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @073A *, ,CES 'PHAGS PA SANGS RGYAS THAMS CAD KYI GSANG BA CHEN PO THABS LA MKHAS PA'I MDO SDE'I RGYA CHER BSHAD PA THABS MKHAS NYAMS LEN GTER MDZOD CES BYA BA 'DI NI, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG CHOS 'DZIN GYIS RANG GI GAM 'DUG NYE 'BREL THOS BSAM LA RTZON PA'I DGE PHRUG ZHIG GLO BUR GSAR 'TSES SKYAS CHEN BTEGS SKABS PHYI MA'I RGYAGS PHYER DMIGS TE MDO 'DI LAN 'GA' 'DON TSE BLO LA GANG SHAR SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA'O,, ,,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN @073B PA RIN PO CHE SGO THAMS CAD NAS PHYOGS THAMS CAD DU DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG ,DGE'O, ,AOm SVA STI, MAN NGAG RTA LJANG BDUN GYIS NYER DRANGS TE, ,GZHAN PHAN THABS MKHAS SPYOD PA'I GO LAR RGYU, ,LUS CAN PHAN BDE'I PAD TSAL BZHAD GNYEN, ,SH'AKYA'I LUGS BZANG RING DU RGYAL GYUR CIG ,GANG DE'I GSUNG GSANG 'DZIN MA LAS THON PA'I, ,BRGYAD KHRI BZHI STONG NAD SEL BLTA NA LEGS, ,KUN RMONGS NAD BRGYAS GZIR BA'I 'GRO RNAMS LA, ,PHAN BDE'I DPAL STER MIG GI BDUD RTZIR BSGRUBS, ,DGE 'DIS 'BREL THOGS GTZO BYAS MA RGAN MGRON, ,TSE RABS 'PHRENG BAR DAM PA'I MGON GYIS PA'I BZUNG, ,TSANG LA MA NOR BSTAN PA'I GRUR ZHUGS TE, ,'JIGS RUNG TI MI'I GRONG @074A *, ,LAS MYUR BRGOL SHOG , ,,CES PA 'DI NI DAD LDAN KHYIM BDAG TSE RING DON GRUB KYIS RGYU YON SBYOR TE KHU RAL CHEN MO DGA' LDAN BSHAD SGRUB GLING NA CHOS SBYIN SGO BRGYA 'BYED PA'I PAR GYI 'PHRUL 'KHOR LEGS POR BZHENGS SKABS GYI NA PA CHOS MING BAS SBYAR BA'O, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,
